availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John F. Conn (Rockcastle County, Kentucky, saddler.)

body.p: Rockcastle County, Kentucky, saddler. Virginia native. Father of Alexander C. Conn. Married to Mary Hiatt Conn. Father of Thomas K. Conn, Bennett Conn, Bennett H. Conn, Celia Conn, Tramel Conn, Elizabeth Conn, John B. Conn, Jones A. Conn, Helen Conn, Sarah E. Conn, and Capitola Conn. Hotelkeeper in Lincoln County, Kentucky, in 1850. Saddler in Rockcastle County, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lincoln County, District 2, p. 297B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Rockcastle County, p. 509.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Rockcastle County, District 6, p. 92A.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994053, Rockcastle County Births.

"Thomas K Conn (1847-1874)," Find A Grave, Memorial 5863149, accessed December 11, 2023, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/5863149.
